name: Gulf War io (opoly)
description:
Gulf War io is a 2D property trading board game. The Gulf War was a global war that lasted from August 1990 – February 1991, though related conflicts began earlier. It involved the vast majority of the world's nations—including all of the great powers—eventually forming two opposing military alliances: the Coalition Forces and the Iraqi Military. Collect and trade Scud Missiles, Patriot Missiles, Coalition Battle Ships, Tanks, and other properties while you play a strategic property-based Gulf War game.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
